/usr/bin/c++  -g   CMakeFiles/toyslam.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/toyslam.dir/bundleAdjustment.cpp.o  -o toyslam -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib /usr/local/lib/libopencv_dnn.so.3.4.6 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_videostab.so.3.4.6 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_superres.so.3.4.6 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_stitching.so.3.4.6 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_viz.so.3.4.6 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_shape.so.3.4.6 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_ml.so.3.4.6 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_objdetect.so.3.4.6 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_photo.so.3.4.6 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_calib3d.so.3.4.6 /usr/local/lib/libpangolin.so -lcxsparse -lcholmod -lg2o_cli -lg2o_ext_freeglut_minimal -lg2o_simulator -lg2o_solver_slam2d_linear -lg2o_types_icp -lg2o_types_slam2d -lg2o_core -lg2o_interface -lg2o_solver_csparse -lg2o_solver_structure_only -lg2o_types_sba -lg2o_types_slam3d -lg2o_csparse_extension -lg2o_opengl_helper -lg2o_solver_dense -lg2o_stuff -lg2o_types_sclam2d -lg2o_parser -lg2o_solver_pcg -lg2o_types_data -lg2o_types_sim3 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_video.so.3.4.6 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_features2d.so.3.4.6 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_flann.so.3.4.6 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_highgui.so.3.4.6 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_videoio.so.3.4.6 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgcodecs.so.3.4.6 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgproc.so.3.4.6 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_core.so.3.4.6 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLU.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGL.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLEW.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libwayland-client.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libwayland-egl.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libwayland-cursor.so -lEGL -lxkbcommon /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libSM.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libICE.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libX11.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libXext.so -lrt -lpthread
